data.title: The Guardian
data.meta_description: Latest news, sport, business, comment, analysis and reviews from the Guardian, the world's leading liberal voice
data.text:
The endearingly dorky actor has acquired a taste for less likeable roles. Next, he's tripping across Chile – literally – for his new film Crystal Fairy

Superbad's Evan Goldberg has turned bromance into comedy gold. He tells Hadley Freeman about writing for Ali G, the secret to comedy and why his new apocalypse movie is touching

He is the actor behind some generation-defining nerds, including McLovin from Superbad. Steve Rose meets the man happy to be called geek

For all its predictability, this tale of growing up and getting out, set in a Reading that's a million miles from the Slough of The Office, is heartfelt and affecting, says Catherine Shoard

From Marlon Brando in The Wild One to Superbad, Killian Fox charts the development of the teen genre

From Superbad to this in little over a year, the one-time crown prince of comedy looks to have fallen far and fast

Superbad star returns to the Texas festival where Knocked Up debuted with new film Observe and Report

Is this comedy about a broken-hearted puppeteer as good as Superbad and Knocked Up? Or is it time for the Judd Apatow backlash?
